meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a turnip.
meanings.sent1: The turnipy smell of the soup filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested a bunch of turnipy vegetables from the field.
meanings.sent3: The turnipy clouds in the sky looked like giant cotton balls.
meanings.sent4: Her turnipy hair was so orange, it reminded me of a sunset.
meanings.sent5: The turnipy taste of the stew lingered on my tongue for hours.

meanings.sent1: The salad had a strong turnipy flavor that I didn't enjoy.
meanings.sent2: She cooked a delicious turnipy dish for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The turnipy ice cream flavor was surprisingly refreshing.
meanings.sent4: The air in the kitchen was filled with the turnipy aroma of roasting vegetables.
meanings.sent5: The turnipy aftertaste of the soup made me crave more.
